alert.note: Alert for Coastal Jackson; Coastal Matagorda; Inland Jackson; Inland Matagorda; Matagorda Islands (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 28 at 9:40PM CDT by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Jackson, southern Brazoria and Matagorda Counties through 1015 PM CDT... At 939 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Angleton to near Jones Creek to 11 miles southwest of Sargent to near Port Oconnor. Movement was southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Matagorda, Lake Jackson, Angleton, Bay City, Freeport, Clute, Palacios, West Columbia, Sweeny, Surfside Beach, South Texas Nuclear Plant, Richwood, Brazoria, Jones Creek, Oyster Creek, Point Comfort, Bailey`s Prairie, Sargent, Van Vleck and Alamo Beach. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until midnight CDT for south central and southeastern Texas.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Jackson; Coastal Matagorda; Inland Jackson; Inland Matagorda; Matagorda Islands
